extension.name: ContentBuilder - Validation - Date Not Before
extension.author: Markus Bopp - Crosstec GmbH & CO. KG
extension.copyright: This Joomla! component is released under the GNU/GPL license
extension.description: Checks if the given date is not before the other date. You have to add the suffix "_later" to the comparable date field. Means, if your date before field name is "date", the later date's name would be "date_later".
